meanings.definition: Not emitting light when exposed to ultraviolet radiation.
meanings.sent1: The room was nonfluorescent even under the UV light.
meanings.sent2: The nonfluorescent paint did not glow in the dark.
meanings.sent3: The detective used a nonfluorescent flashlight to search for clues in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfluorescent personality never shone brightly in social gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The nonfluorescent stars seemed to disappear in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The mineral was nonfluorescent under the special light.
meanings.sent2: The nonfluorescent gemstone remained dull under the UV lamp.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand was nonfluorescent, making his tricks less magical.
meanings.sent4: His nonfluorescent ideas failed to capture the audience's attention.
meanings.sent5: The nonfluorescent flowers looked ordinary in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The nonfluorescent liquid stayed dark even in the UV chamber.
meanings.sent2: The nonfluorescent dye did not change color under the blacklight.
meanings.sent3: The nonfluorescent stickers were hard to spot in the dark room.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfluorescent outfit blended in with the crowd at the party.
meanings.sent5: The nonfluorescent sign was easily missed in the dimly lit street.
